00123     public:    virtual string    getPacketValid (bool strict, int32_t length) const {
00124       return BasicCommandPacket::getPacketValid(strict, length);
00125     }
00126     public: virtual inline void setPacketType (PacketType t) {
00127       if (t != PacketType_Command) {
00128         throw VRTException("Can not change packet type to non-Command type when using BasicControlPacket");
00129       }
00130       BasicVRTPacket::setPacketType(t);
00131     }

00148     // BasicVRTPacket originally provides this method, which returns true always,
00149     // as is appropriate for BasicCommandPacket.
00150     // IndicatorFieldProvider also provides this method, but returns value of Change Indicator
00151     // as is appropriate for BasicContextPacket.
00152     // BasicControlPackets should default to BasicContextPacket's implementation; ensure that here.
00153     public: virtual bool isChangePacket () const {
00154       return BasicContextPacket::isChangePacket();
00155     }
